translated: Points of Controversy
The Minor Collection
The Twentieth Section
The Teaching
“Is the Dispensation made new?”
“Yes.”
“Are the Foundations of Mindfulness made new?”
“Is it so that the Blessed One has not declared the four noble truths?” …
“Is the Dispensation made new?”
“Yes.”🔽“Are the Right Strivings …🔽the Bases of Psychic Power …
the Faculties …
the Powers …
the Factors of Awakening made new?”
“Is it so that the Blessed One has not declared the four noble truths?” …
“Is what was previously unwholesome made wholesome afterwards?”
“Is it so that the Blessed One has not declared the four noble truths?” …

original: pubbe sāsavaṁ …pe… saṁyojaniyaṁ ganthaniyaṁ oghaniyaṁ yoganiyaṁ nīvaraṇiyaṁ parāmaṭṭhaṁ upādāniyaṁ …pe… saṅkilesiyaṁ pacchā asaṅkilesiyaṁ katanti?
analyzed: pubbe sa āsavam pe sayojaniyam ganthaniyam oghaniyam yoganiyam nīvaraṇiyam parāmaṭṭham upādāniyam pe saṅkilesiyam pacchā asaṅkilesiyam katanti
translated: “Is what was previously subject to cankers, connected with the cankers, associated with the cankers, accompanied by the cankers, liable to the cankers, made free from cankers afterwards?”
“Is it so that it is not to be said that it is a person who is the same in the past and in the future?” …

original: Atthi koci tathāgatassa sāsanaṁ navaṁ karotīti?
analyzed: atthi koci tathāgatassa sāsanam navam karoti iti
translated: “Is there anyone who makes the Dispensation new?”
“Yes.”

analyzed: atthi koci satipaṭṭhāne navam karoti iti
translated: “Is there anyone who makes the Foundations of Mindfulness new?”
“Is it so that the Blessed One has not declared the four noble truths?” …

analyzed: atthi koci sammappadhāne pe  iddhipāde pe
translated: “Is there anyone who makes the Right Strivings …
the Bases of Psychic Power …🔽the Faculties …
the Powers …🔽the Factors of Awakening new?”
Does he make the path, the fruit, Nibbāna, and the enlightenment factors new?”
“That can’t be said.”

original: atthi koci pubbe akusalaṁ pacchā kusalaṁ karotīti?
analyzed: atthi koci pubbe akusalam pacchā kusalam karoti iti
translated: “Is there anyone who previously did what’s unwholesome and later what’s wholesome?”
“That can’t be said.”

original: atthi koci pubbe sāsavaṁ …pe… saṅkilesiyaṁ pacchā asaṅkilesiyaṁ karotīti?
analyzed: atthi koci pubbe sa āsavam pe saṅkilesiyam pacchā asaṅkilesiyam karoti iti
translated: “Is there anyone who previously had what’s associated with defilements and later what’s undefiled?”
“That can’t be said.”

original: Labbhā tathāgatassa sāsanaṁ puna navaṁ kātunti?
analyzed: labbhā tathāgatassa sāsanam puna navam kātunti
translated: “Is it possible to make the Buddha’s instruction new again?”
“Yes.”

analyzed: labbhā sati paṭṭhānā puna navam kātunti
translated: “Is it possible to make the foundations of mindfulness new again?”

analyzed: na ha ivam vattabbe pe  labbhā sammappadhānā pe
translated: “That can’t be said.”🔽“Is it possible to make the right efforts …
the bases of spiritual success …
the faculties …
the powers …
the awakening factors new again?”
“That can’t be said.”

original: labbhā pubbe akusalaṁ pacchā kusalaṁ kātunti?
analyzed: labbhā pubbe akusalam pacchā kusalam kātunti
translated: “Is it possible to do what’s unwholesome and later what’s wholesome?”
“That can’t be said.”

original: labbhā pubbe sāsavaṁ …pe… saṅkilesiyaṁ pacchā asaṅkilesiyaṁ kātunti?
analyzed: labbhā pubbe sa āsavam pe saṅkilesiyam pacchā asaṅkilesiyam kātunti
translated: “Is it possible to have what’s associated with defilements and later what’s undefiled?”
“That can’t be said.”
The discussion of the instruction is finished.
